name: My Childhood Game
description:
Here is a game I used to play as a kid, recreated from my childhood memories for my child.
The cat follows the mouse, wherever it goes.
When the mouse stops moving, the cat falls asleep.
To avoid waking the cat, you can move the mouse very slowly.

Credits

Made by: Thibaud
Cat sprites: GrandmaDeb from forums.rpgmakerweb.com here
Mouse sprites: Whtdragon from forums.rpgmakerweb.com here
Music: "In The Moment" by Steve Oxen here
